title: Man, 76, remanded over 'drug-laced sweets' at summer camp - BBC News
analysis: The headline of this news article reads "Get the news your way". The key points of the article are related to an online registration system for the BBC, which includes a sign-in button for podcasts, documentaries, and analysis. The summary of the article is focused on promoting the BBC's online presence and the variety of content available on their website.
